column4: Line Item description (company language) — product/service only
column5: Where the text was found in the 10-K

column4: Apple’s line of smartphones based on iOS (the iPhone line includes iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone Air, iPhone 17, iPhone 16 and iPhone 16e).
Apple’s line of personal computers based on macOS, including MacBook Air and MacBook Pro laptops, and iMac, Mac mini, Mac Studio, Mac Pro desktops.
Apple’s line of multipurpose tablets based on iPadOS, including iPad Pro, iPad Air, iPad, iPad mini.

Wearables: smartwatches, wireless headphones and spatial computers (Apple Watch models; AirPods / Beats; Apple Vision Pro). Home: Apple TV 4K and HomePod/HomePod mini. Accessories: Apple-branded and third-party accessories.
column5: Item 1 — Business — Products — Wearables, Home and Accessories

column4: Services include: Advertising (third-party licensing arrangements and Apple’s own ad platforms); AppleCare (fee-based support, priority access to technical support, repair/replacement services, additional coverage in many cases); Cloud services (store and keep customer content up-to-date and available across Apple devices and Windows PCs); Digital content platforms incl. the App Store (discover/download apps and digital content such as books, music, video, games, podcasts); Subscription services (Apple Arcade, Fitness+, Music, News+, Apple TV offering original content and live sports); and Payment services (Apple Card and Apple Pay).
column5: Item 1 — Business — Services (Advertising, AppleCare, Cloud Services, Digital Content, Subscription Services, Payment Services)

column4: Sales through Amazon’s online stores: a wide selection of consumable and durable goods (including media products in physical and digital formats such as books, videos, games, music, software), including digital products sold on a transactional basis.
column5: Item 8 — Financial Statements — Disaggregated net sales footnote (1)

column4: Sales in Amazon’s physical stores where customers physically select items in a store.
column5: Item 8 — Financial Statements — Disaggregated net sales footnote (2)

column4: Services provided to third-party sellers including commissions and related fulfillment and shipping fees, plus other third-party seller services; Amazon also describes programs that enable sellers to grow their businesses, sell products in Amazon stores, and fulfill orders using Amazon services.
column5: Item 8 — Disaggregated net sales footnote (3); Item 1 — Business — Sellers

column4: Advertising services sold to sellers, vendors, publishers, authors, and others, including programs such as sponsored ads, display, and video advertising.
Subscription fees including Amazon Prime memberships (annual/monthly) and access to content/services including digital video, audiobooks, digital music, e-books, and other non-AWS subscriptions.

Amazon Web Services provides a broad set of on-demand technology services for developers and enterprises (including start-ups, government agencies, academic institutions), including compute, storage, database, analytics, machine learning, and other services.
column5: Item 1 — Business — Developers and Enterprises; Item 8 — Segment description of AWS

column4: Other offerings including healthcare services, certain licensing and distribution of video content, shipping services, and co-branded credit card agreements.
